main.name: Kevin Hadi Sutanto
main.description: Blockchain Backend Software Engineer with a demonstrated history of working in the computer software industry
main.bio: Have some experience in Go,  Node.js, Python, MS SQL, NoSQL and Docker. Strong engineering professional graduated from Dian Nuswantoro University. Likes to read Novel, Sing a song, doing sports (Badminton and Muay Thai) and traveling.
main.contactmessage: It would be my pleasure to be able to be working with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: I learn about the basic of programming on college such as using C++, Java and using Android and Django to develop my Image Processing as my thesis to detect faces on the photo taken by phone. And for my part-time, i learn how to use Codeigniter to develop a news website using crawling technique to get the data from other websites.
I joined scouts to develop my leadershipsand participate in my church youth organizations.

work.title: Technical Associate
work.description: Im developing the Blockchain Explorer with my main team on the scheduler for parsing and process the data and api to relay the data to api to the UI using NodeJS, and helping the core team in developing the core application sometimes. Once my boss asked me to develop the unit testing to stress test the core to test its endurance. We are using Git for versioning and MongoDB for the explorer database.

work.title: Quality Assurance
work.description: Work to ensure that the quality of the code meets the standart criteria and implements to the users.

work.title: Junior IT Consultant
work.description: Handling HRIS and SAP company's product for clients internal software and consulting. technology used : MS Sql Server and Alpha Anywhere.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
